name: Game LOLOL
description:
This is a game with many FPS game's feature I like! I tried to take the best feature from each fps game and hope you could notice when you are playing.

I put some hard works in this game, pretty fun, got all the features from different fps games I like. Stitched them up and glad they worked! Watched a tons of toturial and learned everything from them. Big thanks to my teachers and Youtube.

Please pay attention to the white texts while playing. 

Hope you like it. -Jason Zeng

: D

Resources are from Unity Asset store, big thanks to my friend Ville for the Katana model.

Sound effects are from popular FPS games and https://ibaotu.com/ 

And music from QQ music.

(there are easter egg in the game!)
